## SelectEditor.init() method

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(params: SelectEditorParams): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  params | [SelectEditorParams](./grid-pro.selecteditorparams.md) | Configuration parameters for the select editor including positioning, values, and display options |

**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

The `init()` method configures the select editor with the provided parameters. The editor supports positioning control through the `position` parameter in SelectEditorParams.

## See Also

- [SelectEditorParams.position](./grid-pro.selecteditorparams.position.md) - Configure dropdown positioning
